text: Hans Albert (8 February 1921 - 24 October 2023) was a German philosopher. He was born in Cologne, Germany. His fields of research are Social Sciences and General Studies of Methods. He was a critical rationalist, giving special attention to rational heuristics (problem solving). He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. Albert died on 24 October 2023 in Heidelberg, Germany at the age of 102. ==Decorations and awards== * Iron Cross, 2nd class * 1976: Ernst Hellmut Vits Prize * 1994: Austrian Cross of Honour for Science and Art, 1st class * 2008: Merit Cross 1st Class of the Federal Republic of Germany (Verdienstkreuz 1.
